roleset.name: (cause to) move in \/\/\/ fashion
roleset.note: ZIG-V NOTES: frame by Perryn. VN class meander-47.7 and run-51.3.2 actually have member 'zigzag', not just 'zig'. Same with FN. Structure is the same in both cases though. (from zig.01-v)

example.name: you zig
example.text: It's been zigging and zagging between green and red.
